ygData.subject: Re: Secret Code (OOC)
ygData.msgSnippet: The funny thing about the acronym-itus that has struck in EverQuest (note I did not use EQ?  hehe), is that one of our regular group members makes up acronyms
ygData.messageBody:
The funny thing about the acronym-itus that has struck in EverQuest (note I
did not use EQ? hehe), is that one of our regular group members makes up
acronyms on the spot. Very unnerving for the rest of us. He'll spout one
of these off and the rest of us stand around, looking carefully at each
other, trying to discern if anyone else knows the meaning. Then we all
look at him and say "What??". After countless times, he is still doing
this.

Kendrin shakes her head at Sargyll's garbled speech.
Tunare.
